title: Cross out numbers in pairs to clear the grid!

examples.text: Two of the same numbers can pair up.
Numbers can also pair if they add up 10.

title: Pair up numbers next to each other, or ones that have no other numbers in between.

examples.text: These pairs are next to each other...

title: Numbers on separate rows can be paired up if everything in between them is crossed out.

examples.text: Just think of the grid as one big continuous row!

title: When thereâ€™s nothing left to cross out, pull up for the next round of numbers!
